alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; Newport News; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Suffolk; Virginia Beach (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of , the central City of Norfolk, the northwestern City of Portsmouth, the northeastern City of Suffolk, the northwestern City of Virginia Beach, the City of Hampton and the southern City of Newport News through 830 PM EDT... At 753 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Old Dominion University, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Old Dominion University, Norfolk, and Norfolk NAS around 800 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Phoebus, Wards Corner, and Raleigh Terrace. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hampton, Poquoson; Newport News; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Suffolk; Virginia Beach
